search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Invoice Ninja (invoice-ninja.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Invoice Ninja is: [https://www.invoiceninja.com/pricing/](https://www.invoiceninja.com/pricing/).

extracted_content.content:
Pricing Plans - Free Invoicing Software for Small Businesses | Invoice Ninja
=============== 

 [Skip to content](https://www.invoiceninja.com/pricing/#content)

[![Image 4](https://invoiceninja.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/Invoice-Ninja-v5-1.png)](https://www.invoiceninja.com/)

*   [Products](https://invoiceninja.com/overview/)
    *   Overview
        
        [](https://invoiceninja.com/features/)

        Freelancer? Small business?  
        Features to get you paid, fast.
        
        [](https://invoiceninja.com/expenses/)

        Manage & re-invoice expenses, track vendors & purchase orders.

        Tools to run your business, invoice clients & get paid.

        Automatically import bank, credit card and PayPal transactions.

        Need an awesome solution for invoicing clients? Test Drive!

        Integrate with hundreds apps via Zapier, n8n, Make, Integrately & more

        Beautifully designed invoice templates

        Set up an events calendar, create event pages, invite attendees, issue tickets!
        
        [](https://apps.shopify.com/invoice-ninja-integration)

        Automate your invoicing by connecting Invoice Ninja to your Shopify store!

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

###### How do clients pay me online?

Integrate a payment gateway! What is a payment gateway?

After integrating a “payment gateway” to your Invoice Ninja account, your clients will see a “**Pay Now**” button on their invoices.

The payment gateways processes the payment and your clients never leave their Invoice Ninja client-side portal. Subsequently deposits the money to your bank account.

Invoice Ninja supports dozens of payment gateways, [click here for the full list](https://invoiceninja.com/payments/).

###### How to I put my logo on the invoice?

Navigate to Settings\>Company Details, and click “Logo” to upload or change your logo. This is available to all plans, including free:)

###### Is Invoice Ninja really free?

Yes! Our [FREE Plan](https://invoiceninja.com/pricing/) allows up to 5 clients with unlimited invoicing!

You are never forced to upgrade your invoicing account! However if you choose to [upgrade](https://invoiceninja.com/pricing/) you gain access to unlimited clients + [awesome software features!](https://invoiceninja.com/features/)

###### How do I remove "Invoice Ninja" from the invoice footer?

Upgrade to Pro or Enterprise to remove “Invoice Ninja” from your invoices, quotes, and all client-facing pages!

###### Do you offer a desktop app?

Yes! We offer native macOS, Windows, and Linux apps! [Click here for all options!](http://invoiceninja.com/apps/)

Start using Invoice Ninja Today!

Go Pro with a 30-Day Money Back Promise!
